rules.description: Change return to control if pressed with other keys, to return if pressed alone
Change caps_lock to control if pressed with other keys, to escape if pressed alone.
Caps lock to escape, as control when pressed with other keys
Return as control when pressed with other keys
Space as shift when pressed with other keys

profiles.name: caps/ret: ctrl, shift: opt, space: shift

rules.description: Caps lock to escape, as option when pressed with other keys
Return as option when pressed with other keys
Space as control when pressed with other keys
f/j as control when pressed with other keys
d/k as option when pressed with other keys
4/8 as control when pressed with other keys
3/9 as option when pressed with other keys
Caps lock to escape, as control when pressed with other keys
Return as control when pressed with other keys

profiles.name: caps/ret: ctrl, swap cmd and opt
